title: Bedtime Stories: A Collection of Erotic Fairy Tales
description: All-new! Fairy tales retold with an erotic edge, by the national bestselling author of the Sons of Destiny series.  Jean Johnson sneaks between the covers of such classic fairy tales as Beauty and the Beast, Puss n' Boots, and Sleeping Beauty, and refashions them into bedtime stories for adults only. With clever gender twists, hot fetishistic turns, other-worldly desires, and explorations into forbidden territories, Bedtime Stories reveals a veritable garden of sensual delights that gives new meaning to the term "happy ending."
author: Jean    Johnson
